targets.query:
from(bucket: "snorkel")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "api_requests_latency")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "100_percentile")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value < 10000)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.api_name == "Flow UI")
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({
            path: r.api_name + ": " + r.method + " " + r.path + " " + r.status_code,
            _time: r._time,
            _value: r._value
        }))

panels.title: P100 Latency Under 10000 Millis - Flow UI

panels.description: All requests to Flow UI that took longer than the cutoff.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "snorkel")
   |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
   |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "api_requests_latency")
   |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "100_percentile")
   |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 10000)
   |> filter(fn: (r) => r.api_name == "Flow UI")
   |> map(fn: (r) => ({
           _path: r.api_name + ": " + r.method + " " + r.path + " " + r.status_code,
           _time: r._time,
           _value: r._value
       }))
